title: Key Drops for Hextech Crafting
body: I know Rioters will probably never see this, but I got 4 chests in my first 4 rounds of hextech coming out, and still haven't opened 2 because I don't have enough keys. I play very often. They should change it so it drops keys instead. OR they could make key fragments drop more often, either one works. Just make it more consistent.
